name: Community Season 5
summary: NBC宣布第五季获续订！！ Dan Harmon回归！！
info:
• 中文名: 废柴联盟 第五季
  • 编剧: Dan Harmon
  • 主演: Donald Glover
  • 配角: Nathan Fillion
  • 集数: 13
  • 开始: 2014-01-02
  • 类型: 喜剧
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视台: NBC
  • imdb_id: tt2911368
  • wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Community_(season_5)

eps.name: Repilot
eps.desc: Jeff returns to Greendale when his former law partner Alan Connor recruits him to gather evidence for a lawsuit he is pursuing. Dean Pelton is thrilled to see Jeff back at Greendale. Thinking he is there to help save the school, he quickly calls the study group back together - surprising Jeff with a reunion.

eps.name: Introduction to Teaching
eps.desc: Jeff settles into a new job at Greendale and adjusts to the expectations of being on staff - Professor Hickey shows him the ropes and shares some pointers on how to manage unruly and demanding students. Meanwhile, Abed convinces the study group to take a new class, "Nicolas Cage: Good or Bad," with Professor Garrity.

eps.name: Basic Intergluteal Numismatics
eps.desc: Jeff and Annie try to solve the case of the Ass Crack Bandit, who drops coins into people's pants. Though the suspect is quickly caught, Jeff believes that perhaps the real Bandit is still at large. Meanwhile, the team receives bad news about one of their own.

eps.name: Cooperative Polygraphy
eps.desc: The study group undergo a polygraph test as part of the conditions of Pierce's will, but it soon turns sour as the group's secrets come to light, and Troy makes a major decision in order to satisfy the conditions of the bequeathing.

eps.name: Geothermal Escapism
eps.desc: To honor Troy's last day at Greendale, Abed organizes a campus-wide game of "The Floor Is Lava."

eps.name: Analysis of Cork-Based Networking
eps.desc: Annie and Hickey embark on a mission to start improving Greendale, but it soon turns into a labyrinthine chain of favors. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang help set up a dance, and Abed connects with a fellow student.

eps.name: Bondage and Beta Male Sexuality
eps.desc: Jeff helps Professor Duncan try to win over Britta's affection. Abed and Hickey face off after Abed accidentally ruins some of Hickey's drawings, and Chang finds himself in the middle of a ghostly mystery.

eps.name: App Development and Condiments
eps.desc: The introduction of an app that allows people to rate others causes the campus to devolve into a caste-based society.

eps.name: VCR Maintenance and Educational Publishing
eps.desc: Jeff, Shirley, and Hickey discover a large stash of unused textbooks, but soon turn on each other when deciding the best way to sell them. Meanwhile, Annie and Abed decide they need a new roommate, and play an old-west themed VCR game to decide between Annie's brother Anthony or Abed's girlfriend Rachel.

eps.name: Advanced Advanced Dungeons & Dragons
eps.desc: The study group organizes a game of Dungeons & Dragons so that Prof. Hickey can reconnect with his estranged son, Hank (David Cross).

eps.name: G.I. Jeff
eps.desc: Jeff hallucinates an animated adventure in the style of G.I. Joe.

eps.name: Basic Story
eps.desc: When Greendale is appraised to be an asset instead of a liability, the school board immediately decides to sell it to Subway. Abed, Annie, and the Dean find a secret that may save the school, and Jeff must decide where his allegiance lies.

eps.name: Basic Sandwich
eps.desc: With Greendale hours away from sale, the group searches for the hidden lab of the school's first dean, believing there is a treasure there which can save the school.
